basics.name: Tom Han Chongye
basics.label: Incoming Research Assistant at Salk Institute
basics.summary: B.A. in Molecular and Cellular Biology and Computer Science

education.area: Molecular and Cellular Biology, Computer Science
courses: CSCI 3485 - Deep Learning for Computer Vision
BIOL 3333 - Advanced Molecular and Cellular Biology

work.summary: Honors Student for Dr. Hadley Horch
highlights: Created a novel analysis pipeline for flight behavior in G. bimaculatus from data collection to analysis report.
Conducted full time original research to understand the basis of adaptive behaviors and plasticity in adult crickets.
Processed over 100+ GB of high throughput pose estimation data, reduced analysis runtime by 50%

work.company: Bowdoin College Center for Learning and Teaching
work.summary: Assisting in the teaching of undergraduate courses in computer science and mathematics.
highlights: I was learning assistant and/or grader for the following class:
Artificial Intelligence with Professor Jeova Farias (2025 Spring)
Computer Systems with Professor Sean Barker and Stephen Houser (2024 Spring/Fall)
Intro to Data Science with Professor Jack O'Brien (2024 Fall)
Data Structures with Professor Dave Byrd (2023 Spring/Fall)

work.name: Bowdoin College Information Technology
highlights: Assist in event production and provide technical support for various campus events, such as commencement, guest lecturers, and student-led plays.
Used TeamDynamix ITSM to generate/maintain detailed ticket records and update documentation
Mentored and trained new technicians alongside the Event Production Coordinator

volunteer.summary: Co-founded the first affinity group at Bowdoin College for Chinese and Chinese American students. Organizing cultural events, engaging on average 150+ participants for 10 events per semester, fostering a supportive and strong community for Chinese students and faculties at Bowdoin College.

awards.title: CS Senior Book Award
awards.summary: Awarded to Senior in CS major demonstrated excellence in coursework and incorpated concepts in CS in their research works.

awards.title: Sarah and James Bowdoin Scholar
awards.summary: Similar to Dean's List, Awarded for academic excellence.
